text: Filip Vandewal (born 31 May 1981) is a Belgian cinematographer. Filip graduated from the Brussels movie school RITS in 2003. Movies he has worked on have been screened at several international movie festivals including Cannes Film Festival and Clermont-Ferrand. He was the cinematographer on De laatste zomer (Last Summer), a movie directed by Joost Wijnant. Filip now lives in Los Angeles. ==References== == Other websites == * Filip Vandewal website * Filip Vandewal at the Internet Movie Database Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian filmmakers Category:Cinematographers
title: Filip Vandewal
